DOC.brief_summary: Study determine effect multiple oral dos ezetimibe pharmacokinetics single oral dose cyclosporine young healthy male female .
DOC.criteria: Subject male female 18 45 year age Subject judge good health basis history , physical examination , routine laboratory data Premenopausal woman currently pregnant currently nursing Subjects drug substance abuse , poor mental function , history major gastrointestinal abnormality ( stomach issue ) , high cholesterol Subject donate blood participate another clinical trial within last four week
